document.full_text: south korea denied on thursday the north's claim that it had "begged" for a summit, trying to discredit a revelation by pyongyang of secret meetings between officials and a stinging rejection of seoul's overtures for talks.
document.title: south korea denies claim by north it begged for summit
lines_and_colors: south korea denied on thursday the north's claim that it had "begged" for a summit, trying to discredit a revelation by pyongyang of secret meetings between officials and a stinging rejection of seoul's overtures for talks.
